page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF AREA - BLACKO
page.content: This is mainly a farming and residential area. The main residential area is around the village of{BLACKO.} {PENDLE HILL}makes a lovely backdrop with little folding hills and winding valleys which surround the village, {THE WATER MEETINGS}is a popular place for family picnics.{BLACKO TOWER}is a landmark which dominates the area and from here the full Domesday Block can be surveyed. Two reservoirs,{WHITE {MOOR}and{SLIPPER HILL,}feed the {LEEDS-LIVERPOOL CANAL.}The major route through the area is the{A682}and at {BLACKO LAITHS}there used to be a{TOLL {HOUSE,}there are no signs of it now. Apart from farming the only industry in the area is{BLACKO MILL}and {SPRINGFIELD NURSERY.}There are 4 {PUBLIC HOUSES,}a{PRIMARY SCHOOL,}a {METHODIST CHAPEL}and 2{SHOPS. {BLACKO POPULATION 1981 CENSUS - 515.
